content: hats for harris is a fiber arts community-driven initiative aimed at supporting kamala harris and tim walz as they champion social change and equality as we prepare for the upcoming women s march on november 2nd 2024 we invite everyone of all skill levels to join us in creating vibrant handmade hats that symbolize unity empowerment and our commitment to progress whether you crochet for yourself or donate a hat for someone attending the march every stitch counts in making a powerful statement let s come together share our passion for crochet and make a difference youtube step-by-step tutorial https //www youtube com/watch v=omvonxlpvdi&t=16s finished size 23 circumference 7 5 - 8 tall you will need about 100 yards of each color red white blue in a medium weight 4 acrylic yarn please join us in an upcoming zoom meeting where we will craft together august 29th 1 september 11th 2 september 19th 3 september 23rd 4 october 6th 5 october 19th 6 october 29th 7 fiber substitutions can be made if you would prefer to use a yarn from your local yarn shop a dk or aran weight yarn is recommended cascade 220 8 berroco vintage 9 sandnes garn double sunday 10 enjoy 1 https //us06web zoom us/meeting/register/tzisdeuorzmvetam7-ijn1ur1bygdccjpx4b 2 https //us06web zoom us/meeting/register/tzuqducvrjmjhdq_6kmhsy8gusmbwgpqo_ao 3 https //us06web zoom us/meeting/register/tzisc-mhqt0ue9k7yjfbp4gag09drrts6mpk 4 https //us06web zoom us/meeting/register/tzcrf-qtqdgoe9e5kzw03dkmhbtrc7qfb7hm 5 https //us06web zoom us/meeting/register/tzatdo-oqzgphdzy6tlimrio1msux7n32g0m 6 https //us06web zoom us/meeting/register/tzmsf-qvrzijhtz8yizwrw2ss5gdxv0qy6ar 7 https //us06web zoom us/meeting/register/tz0ufuiopjwvhddqyshbzwwhbogxaastcsgx 8 https //www yarn com/products/cascade-yarns-220-superwash 9 https //www yarn com/products/berroco-vintage 10 https //www sandnes-garn com/find-store lat=38 716111&lng=-79 311148&zoom=3 47
